sense.def:
Količina, vzorec, metoda ali mnenje, ki so
fixed
, so vedno enaki.

seg.quote: The signal goes on sounding at fixed intervals.
Children can be raised without fixed ideas and prejudices.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
fixed in one's mind
, se človek tistega dobro spominja.

seg.quote: The scene was firmly fixed in all our minds.
